name: part_002
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】紫咲シオン 5th Anniversary LIVE【#紫咲シオン5周年記念⁠】 [KdFYu1feK30]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Murasaki Shion performs 'Kaijuu no Uta' on a festive 3D stage with balloons and holographic effects.
Instrumental transition between songs as the stage lighting changes.
Murasaki Shion performs 'Mikazuki' in a night-themed setting with a crescent moon in the background.

subtitles.original: 手を伸ばして
subtitles.english: Reach out your hand

subtitles.original: 眠れない夜をまた伸ばして
subtitles.english: Extending the sleepless night again

subtitles.original: 眠くない今だね
subtitles.english: I'm still not sleepy

subtitles.original: そんな日々でいたいのにね
subtitles.english: Even though I want to stay in those days

subtitles.original: 眠れない夜に手を伸ばして
subtitles.english: Reach out your hand in the sleepless night

subtitles.original: 眠れない夜をまた伸ばして
subtitles.english: Extending the sleepless night again

subtitles.original: 眠くない今だね
subtitles.english: I'm still not sleepy

subtitles.original: そんな夜に歌う
subtitles.english: Singing on such a night

subtitles.original: 怪獣の歌
subtitles.english: The monster's song

subtitles.original: 怪獣の歌
subtitles.english: Monster's Song

subtitles.original: 過ぎていく日々はどうかな
subtitles.english: How are the days passing by?

subtitles.original: 落ちていく
subtitles.english: Falling down

subtitles.original: 過去は冴えないね
subtitles.english: The past is dull

subtitles.original: 見せたい未来は繊細で
subtitles.english: The future I want to show is delicate

subtitles.original: 過ぎていく日々はどうかな
subtitles.english: How are the days passing by?

subtitles.original: 君がね
subtitles.english: You...

subtitles.original: ミカヅキ
subtitles.english: Crescent Moon

subtitles.original: 今宵満月ではないわ
subtitles.english: It's not a full moon tonight

subtitles.original: 嫌いな満月がキラキラ
subtitles.english: The hated full moon is sparkling

subtitles.original: 幸せそうに世界を照らしている
subtitles.english: Happily lighting up the world

subtitles.original: 丁度私はできそこないでどうしようもなくて
subtitles.english: Exactly, I'm a failure and there's nothing I can do

subtitles.original: 夜明け夢見ては地べた這いずり回ってる
subtitles.english: Dreaming of dawn, crawling around on the ground

subtitles.original: それでも誰かに見つけて欲しくて
subtitles.english: Still, I want someone to find me

subtitles.original: 夜空見上げて叫んでいる
subtitles.english: Looking up at the night sky and screaming

subtitles.original: 逃げ出したい 逃げ出せない
subtitles.english: I want to escape, I can't escape

subtitles.original: 明るい未来は見えないね
subtitles.english: I can't see a bright future, can I?

subtitles.original: それでもあなたに見つけて欲しくて
subtitles.english: Still, I want you to find me

subtitles.original: 蝶のように舞い上がるの
subtitles.english: I'll soar like a butterfly

subtitles.original: 欠けた翼で飛んだ
subtitles.english: I flew with broken wings

subtitles.original: 醜い星の子 ミカヅキ
subtitles.english: The ugly star-child, Mikazuki

subtitles.original: 今宵満月ではないわ
subtitles.english: It's not a full moon tonight

subtitles.original: 嫌いな満月がユラユラ
subtitles.english: The hated full moon is swaying

subtitles.original: 誰かの腕に抱かれて眠っている
subtitles.english: Sleeping in someone's arms

subtitles.original: 丁度私は一人の夜に押しつぶされては
subtitles.english: Exactly, I'm being crushed by a lonely night

subtitles.original: 誰にも見えない夜闇這いずり回ってる
subtitles.english: Crawling around in the darkness that no one can see

subtitles.original: それでも誰にも負けたくなくて
subtitles.english: Still, I don't want to lose to anyone

subtitles.original: 宇宙の隅でもがいている
subtitles.english: Struggling in a corner of the universe

subtitles.original: 追いつきたい 追い越したい
subtitles.english: I want to catch up, I want to overtake

subtitles.original: 夢に見たいような世界ね
subtitles.english: A world like one I'd see in a dream, right?

subtitles.original: それとも誰かと比べてばかり
subtitles.english: Still, always comparing myself to someone

subtitles.original: 周りを見ては立ち止まって
subtitles.english: Looking around and stopping

subtitles.original: 欠けたものを探した
subtitles.english: Searching for what's missing

subtitles.original: そんな自分を変えたい
subtitles.english: I want to change that self

subtitles.original: それでもあなたと同じ景色がまた見たいから
subtitles.english: Because I still want to see the same scenery as you again

subtitles.original: 泣き出したくても 投げ出したくても
subtitles.english: Even if I want to cry, even if I want to give up

subtitles.original: 諦めたりはできない
subtitles.english: I can't give up

subtitles.original: それでもあなたに見つかるように
subtitles.english: Still, so that you can find me

subtitles.original: 蛹は強く手を伸ばすの
subtitles.english: The chrysalis strongly reaches out its hand

subtitles.original: 欠けたもの抱きしめて
subtitles.english: Embracing the missing pieces

subtitles.original: 願いを放つよ ミカヅキ
subtitles.english: I'll release my wish, Mikazuki

subtitles.original: それでも誰かに見つけて欲しくて
subtitles.english: Still, I want someone to find me

subtitles.original: 夜空見上げて叫んでいる
subtitles.english: Looking up at the night sky and screaming

subtitles.original: 泣き出したいけど 泣き出さない
subtitles.english: I want to cry, but I won't cry

subtitles.original: もう後戻りなどできないね
subtitles.english: I can't turn back anymore, can I?

subtitles.original: それでもあなたに見つけて欲しくて
subtitles.english: Still, I want you to find me

subtitles.original: 蝶のように舞い上がるの
subtitles.english: I'll soar like a butterfly

subtitles.original: 欠けた翼で飛ぶよ
subtitles.english: I'll fly with broken wings

subtitles.original: 醜い星の子 ミカヅキ
subtitles.english: The ugly star-child, Mikazuki

subtitles.original: 光を放った ミカヅキ
subtitles.english: Released the light, Mikazuki
